name: Janitor Simulator (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Janitor Simulator (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Theresa H. and Sam M.

Janitor Simulator takes you through the experience of being a janitor at a hospital, but there’s a twist. While you are scrubbing up the puddles you notice that the puddles start to look a little bit different. They become sticky. Make sure to follow your orders because if you don’t you might regret it.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
